version_description:
We added trophies to team page and also redesigned team page.
In league section we added who misses the most chances (yes it's Aubameyang) and who creates the most chances.
We squashed a few bugs for you

Team form have been added to match facts
iPhone X glitches are fixed
Improved the ads loading to make them cause less annoyance

You asked for dark mode and here it is!
Also we added league trophies so you can see who won the Premier League over 100 years back.

You asked for dark mode and here it is!
Also we added league trophies so you can see who won the Premier League over 100 years back.

We added infinite scroll to the news pages so now you can read news all day long.
We added more days in the past and future to the live screen.
We added a ton of TV schedules countries.
We fixed the freeze issue, if not let us know at support@norapps.no!

We added infinite scroll to the news pages so now you can read news all day long.
We added more days in the past and future to the live screen.
We added a ton of TV schedules countries.
We fixed the freeze issue, if not let us know at support@norapps.no!

We rewrote our goal alerts to be blazingly fast again! You have to turn on "fast push" in the settings menu to try them out.
Also fixed some crashes here and there.

Added TV schedules to India
We tweaked team fixtures to look a bit better
We added match details inside news article if the match is related to the article
Rolling out our fast push step by step. If any issues please toggle it on/off in settings.

Added TV schedules to India
We tweaked team fixtures to look a bit better
We added match details inside news article if the match is related to the article
Rolling out our fast push step by step. If any issues please toggle it on/off in settings.
We squashed some more bugs.

We added Player vs Player comparison in player profile!
We made tournament clickable in match facts.
And we fixed some bugs.

We added Player vs Player comparison in player profile!
We made tournament clickable in match facts.
And we fixed some bugs.

We added Player vs Player comparison in player profile!
We made tournament clickable in match facts.
And we fixed some bugs.

We added Player vs Player comparison in player profile!
We made tournament clickable in match facts.
And we fixed some bugs.

Together with our partner COPA90, we have added videos in the news feed. Expect much more to come here for the World Cup!
And we squashed some more bugs.
We squashed some more bugs.
We added our World Cup 2018 mode! You can now switch to our brand new World Cup experience. Hope you enjoy it!
We added our World Cup 2018 mode! You can now switch to our brand new World Cup experience. Hope you enjoy it!

We localized all the countrynames into various languages
Some design changes to H2H in match facts
Added World Cup balls information in WC 2018 mode
Now we translated all country names and you can even change language in settings of the app
Now we translated all country names and you can even change language in settings of the app

We added new team and player alerts! You can now get alerts for substitutions (team/player), assist, yellow card and player rating.
We also added some interactivity by adding a poll to match facts.

We added chances created to match stats which is key passes + assists combined.
We added new team and player alerts! You can now get alerts for substitutions (team/player), assist, yellow card and player rating.

We split the "Start and fulltime" alert into two alerts. Surprisingly they are split into start and fulltime.
We redid our settings page to give you full control over all alerts that we send you. While you are there, turn on Breaking News to get only the most important news pushed to your device.

We made the poll a bit more compact
We made some bugfixes to prevent random crashes when reading news

We made the poll a bit more compact
We made some bugfixes to prevent random crashes when reading news

We made the poll a bit more compact
We made some bugfixes to prevent random crashes when reading news

Stadium names are now clickable in match facts for the major leagues.
We did a makeover for the team overview screen making it better looking.
Made sure that FotMob looks just as good as before on the latest iOS release.

Added
- Goal scorers to the match facts header
- Country name to stadium info
- League logos in various places
- Minutes per goal to Player vs Player comparison
- Clean sheets to Player vs Player comparison
- Ireland top division to leagues with transfer alerts

Changed
- Dark mode tweaks
- Group is now clickable in the match listing

Added
- Goal scorers to the match facts header
- Country name to stadium info
- League logos in various places
- Minutes per goal to Player vs Player comparison
- Clean sheets to Player vs Player comparison
- Ireland top division to leagues with transfer alerts

Changed
- Dark mode tweaks
- Group is now clickable in the match listing

* Switching seasons for the leagues- and players- statistics
* Grouping the matches for the same tournament into one group
* MOTM visual refresh, adjusting Superlive, captain in the lineup
* Bugfixes: avoiding empty search suggestions

- Added lineups to more leagues
- Added probable lineups for the most popular leagues
- Remember Superlive collapse/expand state
- Remember Fantasy button collapse/expand state
- Various polish to make the app look even better

- Added key players ahead of match in match facts
- Added Canada and Thailand TV schedules
- Added Greek translation
- We moved over to subscription based payments. All existing users will have a lifetime subscription.
- Various bugfixes

We finally fixed the issue with leagues being auto-added to your feed. Any new leagues will now have to be manually added via league filtering.
Fixed match facts icons on the Apple Watch

We fixed the mute bug that happened for those of you that muted matches from Apple Watch or by clicking the mute action on the alert.
We tweaked the lineup visuals a bit.
We made a lot of improvements to ensure that FotMob runs even more smoothly on your device.
We now show all the matches for a league on Apple Watch if you have enabled league alerts.

We added home, away and form table.
We did a refresh on the in game player stats so they have more information and are easier to read.
We tweaked the lineup visuals a bit again.

We finally fixed the issue with leagues being auto-added to your feed. Any new leagues will now have to be manually added via league filtering.
Fixed match facts icons on the Apple Watch

- We removed the ongoing tab since you can get to ongoing by toggling the ongoing button in Today
- We added a stats section to the team pages where you can check stats and compare teams
- We added Premier League fantasy points to the lineup for the Premier League
- Added TV schedules for Middle East (BeIN Sports)
- Added point deduction reason to standings
- You can side-swipe when reading news now to get to the next news article

- We removed the ongoing tab since you can get to ongoing by toggling the ongoing button in Today
- We added a stats section to the team pages where you can check stats and compare teams
- We added Premier League fantasy points to the lineup for the Premier League
- Added TV schedules for Middle East (BeIN Sports)
- Added point deduction reason to standings
- You can side-swipe when reading news now to get to the next news article

- Added key players ahead of match in match facts
- Added Canada and Thailand TV schedules
- Added Greek translation
- We moved over to subscription based payments. All existing users will have a lifetime subscription.
- Various bugfixes

- Added lineups to more leagues
- Added probable lineups for the most popular leagues
- Remember Superlive collapse/expand state
- Remember Fantasy button collapse/expand state
- Various polish to make the app look even better

- We added pre-match head-to-head player comparisons to the Match Facts page.
- Various visual adjustments and bugfixes - including proper Turkish localization, fixing Apple Watch notifications UI, avoiding crashes in the polls, and many more!

- Fixed issues with some player images being wrong in leagues like USL and NWSL
- Fixed empty stats boxes for some teams
- Muting alerts for a match should now work more reliably

* Switching seasons for the leagues- and players- statistics
* Grouping the matches for the same tournament into one group
* MOTM visual refresh, adjusting Superlive, captain in the lineup
* Bugfixes: avoiding empty search suggestions

Added
- Goal scorers to the match facts header
- Country name to stadium info
- League logos in various places
- Minutes per goal to Player vs Player comparison
- Clean sheets to Player vs Player comparison
- Ireland top division to leagues with transfer alerts

Changed
- Dark mode tweaks
- Group is now clickable in the match listing

Added
- Goal scorers to the match facts header
- Country name to stadium info
- League logos in various places
- Minutes per goal to Player vs Player comparison
- Clean sheets to Player vs Player comparison
- Ireland top division to leagues with transfer alerts

Changed
- Dark mode tweaks
- Group is now clickable in the match listing

Our biggest UI update in years!
- The new shiny white theme
- Completely redesigned Dark Mode
- Japanese translation has been added
- FAQ page has been updated
- Bugfixes & speed improvements

- We did some polish to the matches screen to make the leagues more distinguishable.
- The app will now follow the system theme by default. You can always change theme in Settings.
- Today Widget now works with dark mode.

Added
- VAR information in match facts and in notifications
- Stadium info to team pages
- Away fans added in match facts for EPL
- New light theme splash

Added
- VAR information in match facts and in notifications
- Stadium info to team pages
- Away fans added in match facts for EPL
- New light theme splash

Added
- VAR information in match facts and in notifications
- Stadium info to team pages
- Away fans added in match facts for EPL
- New light theme splash

Fixed
- App didn't resume properly when being inactive for a while

- Lineups got a visual refresh
- Pending VAR support
- Optimized performance across the app
A more personalized news feed, official highlights, and more.
A more personalized news feed, official highlights, and more.
A more personalized news feed, official highlights, and more.
A more personalized news feed, official highlights, and more.

- Added relevant videos in some news articles
- Changed to show the logo of the team that scores in the alerts
- Added indication of the highest stat number in all the stats pages
- Fixed a crash on startup

- Added relevant videos in some news articles
- Changed to show the logo of the team that scores in the alerts
- Added indication of the highest stat number in all the stats pages
- Fixed a crash on startup

- Now you can expand and collapse all the league in Live Matches. Either one by one or via "pinch/zoom" gesture.
- YouTube highlights now plays inside the app instead of opening a web page
- Various bugfixes

- Now you can expand and collapse all the league in Live Matches. Either one by one or via "pinch/zoom" gesture.
- YouTube highlights now plays inside the app instead of opening a web page
- Various bugfixes

- Added market values to player profiles and "player vs player" comparison
- Can now set preferred currency in settings
- Better adjusting for night-mode if you have it set to automatic
- Various bugfixes

- Added market values to player profiles and "player vs player" comparison
- Can now set preferred currency in settings
- Better adjusting for night-mode if you have it set to automatic
- Various bugfixes

We hope all of you are safe out there. We are still working in these difficult times and have a new update with some features that will be useful when football is back.
- We added the option to show TV schedules from multiple countries at the same time
- Added touches and accurate crosses to match facts
- We now show the next match for each team after the match is finished
- Using English digits for Arabic locale

- Player's Career has been revamped to include the full & detailed information. Follow your favorite player's path!
- Added detailed player's primary and secondary positions information on the Player's profile page
- Various bugfixes

- Player's Career has been revamped to include the full & detailed information. Follow your favorite player's path!
- Added detailed player's primary and secondary positions information on the Player's profile page
- Various bugfixes

We're excited to release a huge update to the app with the brand new Transfer Center! You can access it via the more tab.
Who's in? Who's out? Use the Transfer Center to view every confirmed transfer from the top leagues -- or filter to view just your favorite teams and leagues.
Sort to view the biggest transfer fees, or the players with the highest market value.

- Added option to switch between metric and imperial units
- Added preferred foot in player profile
- Added minutes per goal to player profile season stats
- Head to Head visual improvements
- Various bugfixes

- You can now use Sign in with Apple to store all your favorites and sync your profile across iOS devices.
- It's now possible to swipe continuously through dates without having to tap the Calendar icon.
- Added a bit of polish to the Buzz and Head-to-Head tabs within matches.
- Fixed a couple issues related to ads, crashes, and international tournaments in Favorites. Thanks for all your help in reporting these!

- TV schedules will now automatically filter away finished matches
- For members of FotMob Supporter club, you can now change app icon
- Various minor bug fixes

FotMob widgets are here for iOS 14!
Team Widgets display the most recent result, next fixture, and latest news from any team in the app -- in three different widget sizes.
The Trending News widget always displays the top news story in FotMob, right on your homescreen.
We're excited to hear what you think!

FotMob widgets are here for iOS 14!
Team Widgets display the most recent result, next fixture, and latest news from any team in the app -- in three different widget sizes.
The Trending News widget always displays the top news story in FotMob, right on your homescreen.
We're excited to hear what you think!

We have a bunch of visual updates for you in this version, including:
- A complete redesign of the Favorites tab to make it easier to quickly navigate to your favorite teams, players and leagues.
- The More tab has been cleaned up to make things more manageable for you.
- UI tweaks throughout the app to keep things looking fresh.
Various improvements to the iPad experience
Various improvements to the iPad experience
Various improvements to the iPad experience
We made sure the ads are muted when playing. Sorry about that one!

Live Matches' screen has been reworked to give you a smooth, never-ending scroll experience.
We have also updated the UI for the match lineup
Added favorite leagues support for the Apple Watch App
Resolved multiple issues & glitches.

Resolved multiple issues & glitches.
Improved Accessibility of the app.
Various minor tweaks and improvements.

Resolved multiple issues & glitches.
Improved Accessibility of the app.
Various minor tweaks and improvements.

Resolved multiple issues & glitches.
Improved Accessibility of the app.
Various minor tweaks and improvements.

This is a big one.

We’ve updated the match experience to give you more info in one tab, without getting in the way of the experience you already love. Below match events (goals, cards, etc.) you’ll now find a stats summary, table positions, top players, and more.

Expected goals (xG) is now here! We have xG for all of the top leagues with live data during the match for each team and player.

Team widgets now update with live match data (note that iOS controls how often they refresh).

This is a big one.

We’ve updated the match experience to give you more info in one tab, without getting in the way of the experience you already love. Below match events (goals, cards, etc.) you’ll now find a stats summary, table positions, top players, and more.

Expected goals (xG) is now here! We have xG for all of the top leagues with live data during the match for each team and player.

Team widgets now update with live match data (note that iOS controls how often they refresh).

This release contains mostly polishing and bug fixes, including:
- In matches for cup competitions, we’ve added a tab for tournament brackets.
- Polished dark mode
- Various bug fixes


We hope you’re enjoying the addition of xG from the last release, please let us know what feedback and ideas you have at support@fotmob.com.

We have a big update for you ahead of Euro 2020 and Copa America!
- New homescreen widgets have been added for both tournaments
- Our popular predictor games return for the Euros and Copa America. Make your picks for the tournaments, create leagues, and invite your friends to compete!
